1001.name: InvalidCredential
1001.description: The provided WebAuthn credential is invalid or does not match any registered credential.

1002.name: ExpiredSession
1002.description: The session token has expired. The client must re-authenticate with a full WebAuthn ceremony.

1003.name: RegistrationFailed
1003.description: User registration failed. The username may already be taken, or attestation verification failed.

1004.name: ChallengeFailed
1004.description: The WebAuthn challenge-response verification failed. The signature is invalid or the challenge has expired.

1005.name: SessionRevoked
1005.description: The session was explicitly revoked by an administrator.

2001.name: NotGroupAdmin
2001.description: The operation requires group admin privileges, but the user is a regular member.

2002.name: NotGroupMember
2002.description: The user is not a member of the specified group conversation.

2003.name: NotAdmin
2003.description: The operation requires server admin privileges.

2004.name: AccountDisabled
2004.description: The user's account has been disabled by an administrator.

3001.name: MalformedMessage
3001.description: The message payload could not be deserialized as the expected Protocol Buffer message.

3002.name: UnknownMessageType
3002.description: The MessageType enum value in the Envelope is not recognized by the server.

3003.name: MessageTooLarge
3003.description: The serialized Envelope exceeds the maximum allowed size (default: 64KB).

3004.name: RateLimited
3004.description: The client has exceeded the message rate limit.

3005.name: InvalidEnvelope
3005.description: The binary frame could not be deserialized as a valid Envelope.

4001.name: GroupNotFound
4001.description: The specified conversation ID does not exist or does not refer to a group.

4002.name: AlreadyMember
4002.description: The user being invited is already a member of the group.

4003.name: NotMember
4003.description: The specified user is not a member of the group.

4004.name: CannotRemoveSelf
4004.description: Use group.leave instead of attempting to remove yourself from a group.

4005.name: GroupFull
4005.description: The group has reached the maximum number of members.

5001.name: InvalidKeyPackage
5001.description: The uploaded KeyPackage is malformed or could not be parsed.

5002.name: InvalidCommit
5002.description: The MLS Commit message is malformed or rejected by server-side validation.

5003.name: InvalidWelcome
5003.description: The MLS Welcome message is malformed or could not be parsed.

5004.name: EpochMismatch
5004.description: The MLS operation references an epoch that does not match the server's current state.

5005.name: NoKeyPackageAvailable
5005.description: No KeyPackage is available for the requested user. The user needs to upload new KeyPackages.

9001.name: InternalError
9001.description: An unexpected internal error occurred. The request could not be processed.

9002.name: DatabaseError
9002.description: The database is unreachable or returned an unexpected error.

9003.name: ServiceUnavailable
9003.description: The server is temporarily unavailable (maintenance, overloaded, etc.).
